name: Deltarune Sakuya Battle(Demo)
description:
Sezuire Warning

Hi

Press the right and left arrow keys to change the menu options.

This is a demo of the a Deltarune and Touhou fan game that I will make. If you feel that it's to hard or too easy then please tell me and i'll do my best to fix it.

Thank you and please support me.

Follow me on Twitter: @FantasyRuinX
